backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining chatroom and messaging backend with access control, blob storage, HTTP outcalls, user profiles, reactions, and CRUD operations for chatrooms and messages including admin-only deletion with password.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of max-width 300px for inline images/GIFs in MessageBubble component's non-expanded state with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including routing, query hooks, UI components, styling, and page-level components with detailed feature descriptions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for lobby, chatroom (with messageId search param), and admin routes, conditionally rendering header/footer based on route.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search with trending fallback, or removal, with debounced search and request deduplication.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video, scrollable messages (filtering Creator messages without media), auto-scroll, reply context, and scroll-to-target-message with 3-second highlight.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing metadata like topic, category, message count, viewer count, and live status with platform-specific icons.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input supporting images, YouTube/Twitch videos, and Twitter posts with validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app logo, editable username field (alphanumeric validation, 15 char limit), avatar picker, and back-to-lobby button for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component; authentication is explicitly not used in this anonymous application.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with support for text, images, voice, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter embeds, reactions, pinning, replying, and sharing with user avatars and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, image upload, Giphy GIF picker, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an embedded iframe with an unpin button for chatroom moderators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty/truncated file with no visible content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, duration tracking, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes. Returns the debounced value with a default delay of 300ms.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatroom data is freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Provides recovery state to show loading indicators during cache recovery.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state. Wraps @dfinity/auth-client with React state management and exposes login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom operations (get, search, filter by category, create, delete), message operations (get, send, delete, react), and user profile management. Includes helper functions for username generation, localStorage persistence, and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space. Includes mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, defining the API key and result limit for GIF searches.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B suffixes) for displaying large numbers in a human-readable format.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and sorting capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that fetches and displays a specific chatroom using route params, handles view count incrementing, and renders the ChatArea component with optional message targeting via query params.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a list of chatrooms with search, category filtering, and algorithmic sorting (live rooms first, then by view count and creation date), plus a dialog for creating new chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties including sidebar colors, border radius variables, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking one existing feature to set max-width to 300px for inline images/GIFs in MessageBubble component's non-expanded state.
